item.title: End ID-50 East at ID-25
item.description: End ID-50 East at ID-25 in Jerome County.

item.title: End ID-50 East at ID-25
item.description: End ID-50 East at ID-25. Turn right for ID-25 east to Eden and Hazelton. Continue straight for ID-25 west to Jerome.

item.title: ID-50 East at I-84 (Exit 182)
item.description: ID-50 East at I-84 (Exit 182). Turn right for I-84 East to Burley and Pocatello; continue over freeway for I-84 West to Jerome. Continue on ID-50 east for Eden.

item.title: N 3800 East at ID-50
item.description: N 3800 East at ID-50/To I-84 in Twin Falls County.

item.title: End ID-50 South at US-30
item.description: End ID-50 South at US-30 in Kimberly. The ID-50 shield is brown because it is part of the Thousand Springs Scenic Byway.

item.title: End ID-50 South at US-30
item.description: End ID-50 South at US-30. Turn left on US-30 east for Kimberly and Hansen. Continue on US-30 west for Twin Falls.

item.title: ID-50 South - Twin Falls County
item.description: Entering Twin Falls County on ID-50 south.

item.title: ID-50 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-50 south. Distance to Kimberly and Twin Falls.

item.title: ID-50 South - Thousand Springs Scenic Byway
item.description: ID-50 South - Thousand Springs Scenic Byway

item.title: ID-50 South at I-84 East
item.description: ID-50 south at I-84 east to Burley and Pocatello. Continue on ID-50 for Kimberly and Twin Falls.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 182 Offramp at ID-50
item.description: I-84 West - Exit 182 offramp at ID-50. Turn left for ID-50 west to Kimberly, Hansen, and Twin Falls.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 182
item.description: I-84 West approaching Exit 182 - ID-50/Kimberly/Twin Falls.

item.title: ID-25 East at ID-50
item.description: ID-25 east at ID-50 south. Use either ID-25 or ID-50 for I-84 access.

item.title: ID-25 East at ID-50 to Kimberly
item.description: ID-25 east to Eden and Hazelton, at ID-50 south to Kimberly.

item.title: ID-25 East at ID-50
item.description: ID-25 east approaching ID-50. Use either ID-50 south or ID-25 east for I-84. ID-25 east parallels I-84 from here until the Hazelton area.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 182
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 182, ID-50 junction

item.title: I-84 East Exit 182 Offramp
item.description: I-84 at ID-50 interchange to Eden and Hansen

item.title: US-30 West at ID-50
item.description: Junction ID-50 on US-30 west

item.title: US-30 West at ID-50
item.description: US-30 west at ID-50/To I-84 junction

item.title: US-30 West at ID-50
item.description: US-30 west at ID-50/To I-84 junction to Twin Falls and Bu
